evidence.title: Cloudflare (NET) Is Up 12.7% After Strong Q4, Upbeat 2026 Outlook and Rising AI Demand â€“ What's Changed
evidence.summary: Strong earnings and positive outlook, coupled with rising AI demand, boosted Cloudflare's stock.

key_points: Cloudflare reported strong Q4 2025 results with revenue growth and narrowed net loss.
The company issued higher-than-expected 2026 revenue guidance.
Growing AI-related usage of its network is driving demand.
raw.why_it_moves: Strong earnings and positive outlook, coupled with rising AI demand, boosted Cloudflare's stock.

evidence.title: Cloudflare and Mastercard Partner to Extend Comprehensive Cyber Defense Across Critical Infrastructure and Small Businesses

Focus on enhancing cyber defense for small businesses and critical infrastructure.
raw.why_it_moves: Partnership aimed at strengthening cybersecurity without hindering innovation, potentially beneficial but not expected to significantly impact stock prices.

evidence.title: Cloudflare Mastercard Cybersecurity Alliance And What It May Mean For NET
evidence.summary: Potential increase in security offerings could bolster Cloudflare's market position, but the impact is uncertain given the nascent stage of the partnership.

key_points: Cloudflare and Mastercard announced a partnership to build cybersecurity tools.
The collaboration aims to provide unified threat detection and response for small businesses and critical infrastructure providers.
raw.why_it_moves: Potential increase in security offerings could bolster Cloudflare's market position, but the impact is uncertain given the nascent stage of the partnership.
